data.name: 0000 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I decided to go to the staff room with Koizumi to borrow the key.

data.name: 0001 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: By the way, Koizumi, what do you want to do once we've got the key?

data.name: 0002 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Let's head directly to the music room.

data.name: 0003 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'd like to investigate what kind of phenomena we're handling before Miss Suzumiya arrives.

data.name: 0004 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess I agree with you in that regard…

data.name: 0006 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Arriving outside the staff room, I was fortunate enough to be greeted by a familiar face.

data.name: 0007 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I went straight in to approach him about the key, but…

data.name: 0008 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: The key to the music room? Have you submitted a request form?

data.name: 0009 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Eh--?

data.name: 0010 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Telling him I wanted the key, all I got back was that question.

data.name: 0011 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, say that all you want...

data.name: 0012 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...but, I'm only having to do this because Haruhi got the idea on a whim...

data.name: 0013 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course I don't have that document ready.

data.name: 0014 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Umm, I haven't yet…

data.name: 0015 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I turned to Koizumi in desperation...

data.name: 0016 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He shrugged his shoulders with the same smile as ever plastered on his face.

data.name: 0017 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: His body language says he knew this was coming. It's honestly really annoying.

data.name: 0019 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: My greatest apologies that we were unable to prepare a request form beforehand.

data.name: 0020 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, we never intended to spend an extended period of time using the room.

data.name: 0021 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We will have left prior to other clubs requiring its use.

data.name: 0022 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is for these reasons that I wonder if we couldn't borrow the room for a short period?

data.name: 0023 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's right, we only need it for a little bit.

data.name: 0024 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And there's no way I'm filling out application forms for every little thing anyway.

data.name: 0025 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: I'm afraid I can't allow that. It's the rules. Others have properly submitted it.

data.name: 0026 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it... It's free right now anyway, so just be a little flexible...

data.name: 0028 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06…Koizumi, he said no.

data.name: 0029 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06It's quite troubling.

data.name: 0030 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I felt like I saw a cloud on Koizumi's smile that I thought teachers would be swept up by.

data.name: 0031 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Hey, Koizumi, if he says no, then can't we just leave it at that?

data.name: 0032 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06…Go on?

data.name: 0033 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like, we could just tell Haruhi the truth that we couldn't because we didn't have the form.

data.name: 0034 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we do, she might just give up on investigating the music room.

data.name: 0035 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Even supposing we did tell her so, I'm sure you know better than anyone...

data.name: 0036 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06...that Miss Suzumiya would never give up on it so easily, right?

data.name: 0037 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Ugh…

data.name: 0038 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yeah I know it.

data.name: 0039 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I would never expect Haruhi to yield to democracy.

data.name: 0040 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Well then, I certainly have no intention of remaining here in this verbal tug-of-war.

data.name: 0041 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06We'd better investigate our phenomenon before Miss Suzumiya beats us to it.

data.name: 0042 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, how should we even go about borrow- ing the key from such a stubborn Okabe.

data.name: 0044 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe I should just try asking again. What's the worst that could happen?

data.name: 0045 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Please, Okabe. Just this once, do you mind if we borrow the key for a short while?

data.name: 0046 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Well, you know…

data.name: 0047 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He does seem to have softened his attitude, even if only a little.

data.name: 0048 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Sir, if we are unable to use the room today, it would rather trouble us.

data.name: 0049 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We of course won't cause you any trouble.

data.name: 0050 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: …Are you sure?

data.name: 0051 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: O-of course.

data.name: 0052 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I mean, we need to go to the music room in order to prevent that trouble.

data.name: 0053 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Won't you make an exception for us just this once?

data.name: 0054 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're fully aware that we needed a request form.

data.name: 0055 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: …Well, I guess I can't help it then. Just this once.

data.name: 0056 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thank you so very much.

data.name: 0057 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wow, we somehow made that work. Nice one, Koizumi--what a skilled speaker.

data.name: 0058 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes, of course we will. Thank you ever so much.

data.name: 0059 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A wholesome smile formed on Koizumi's face as he received the key from the teacher.

data.name: 0060 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Koizumi, mind if I leave it to you?

data.name: 0061 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unlike me, Koizumi is an excellent speaker, after all.

data.name: 0062 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Why of course--that is no problem with me.

data.name: 0063 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was a strangely reliable air to Koizumi as he nodded at me.

data.name: 0064 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Sir, am I correct in assuming that as long as we fill in a request form, that should suffice?

data.name: 0065 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Yeah, that's right.

data.name: 0066 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, would you mind if we submit the form on a later occasion?

data.name: 0067 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunately, if we miss the opportunity to visit the room today, it'll put us in a...

data.name: 0068 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...tough spot until the start of the new term.

data.name: 0069 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We would greatly appreciate it if you took this matter into consideration.

data.name: 0070 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After Koizumi's request with his polite tea- cher's pet act, Okabe appeared to consider it.

data.name: 0071 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: I guess so. If that's how it is, I'll give you special permission.

data.name: 0072 (410.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: In return, if you could hand this in to me later.

data.name: 0073 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes, understood. Thank you very much.

data.name: 0074 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi received the key and a request form from the teacher.

data.name: 0076 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well then, shall we head to the music room?

data.name: 0077 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't wink at me--it's gross.

data.name: 0078 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I should definitely be grateful for him being able to borrow the key.

data.name: 0080 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn it, we lost a lot of time on that.

data.name: 0081 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It should be fine as long as we get to the music room before Haruhi.

data.name: 0082 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. We should first aim to group up with those on lookout.

data.name: 0083 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, I agree.

data.name: 0084 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Before Miss Suzumiya gets back...

data.name: 0085 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...I at least want to check the inside of the music room if I can.

data.name: 0086 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's fair--I am starting to get a bad feeling about this though.

data.name: 0087 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right, there is one person who always turns up all of a sudden...

data.name: 0088 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...with such perfect timing that you can only imagine it was carefully coordinated.

data.name: 0089 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Speak of the devil, or whatever.

data.name: 0090 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's probably better for my mental health to assume they're coming and prepare myself.

data.name: 0091 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …No, I'm overthinking it.

data.name: 0092 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What might you be overthinking?

data.name: 0093 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Perhaps that Miss Suzumiya might come back earlier than expected?

data.name: 0094 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あ、ああ……古泉もそう思うのか？

data.name: 0095 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 俺としてはそれはないと 思いたいんだが

data.name: 0096 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 残念ながら、涼宮さんはすぐに 戻ってくるでしょう

data.name: 0097 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: えらく確信に満ちた発言だな

data.name: 0098 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: それも日頃からハルヒを神様と あがめ奉ってる成果か？

data.name: 0099 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: そういうわけではありませんが……

data.name: 0100 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: まあ、カンという点では僕に与えら れた超能力の一種かもしれませんね

data.name: 0101 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: なんだそりゃ

data.name: 0102 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 冗談ですよ冗談

data.name: 0104 (410.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: あら、ずいぶん早かったわね！ ふたりとも感心だわ！

data.name: 0105 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: うげっ、本当に来やがった 嫌な予感は当たるもんだ

data.name: 0106 (410.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: なによ？ 変な顔をしちゃって

data.name: 0107 (410.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: まさかカギを貸してもらえなかった なんて言うんじゃないでしょうね？

data.name: 0108 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いや、ちゃんと借りられたんだが

data.name: 0109 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: え、ええ。その点は まったく問題ありません

data.name: 0110 (410.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: そう？ だったらもっと テンションを上げなさい！

data.name: 0111 (410.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: いよいよこれから音楽室の 怪奇現象に挑むんだからね！

data.name: 0112 (410.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: テンションが高くなるハルヒを よそに、俺と古泉は顔を見合わせた

data.name: 0113 (410.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……はぁ、どうも上手く行かないな

data.name: 0114 (410.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ……ですね

data.name: 0115 (410.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: もう一度頼んでみる

data.name: 0116 (410.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 古泉に任せる

data.name: 0117 (410.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 噂をすれば……

data.name: 0118 (410.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 考えすぎだ
